text:
These NASCAR Pioneers Were Legendary

To say that NASCAR was rough around the edges in its early days would be an understatement. Primitive facilities, safety and payouts didn't exactly put the then-fledgling organization on a pedestal, but the talent behind the wheel was just as good as it ever has been or ever will be. Here are four of the greatest drivers of NASCAR's pioneer era.
